name: Last Sight Vision
flavorText: As you finish the ritual, you see the final moments of the corpse’s life.
text: When you perform this ritual in the presence of a corpse or a skull, you witness an auditory and visual replay of the moments before the death of that creature, as seen from the creature’s perspective. You cannot perform this ritual on headless corpses. Once you have performed this ritual, you must wait until you have gained a level before using it again on the same remains.  Your Arcana or Religion check determines the length of time prior to the target’s death that you experience.
